content: slinky snake works up fairly quick with minimal sewing minimal stuffing and the color options are endless he/she looks great in any color especially in the variegated colors with his curly body safety eyes are optional but do recommend embroidering the eyes for little ones under the age of 3 following pattern - measures approx 20-22 super easy to adapt for a longer shorter smaller or larger verison uses basic stitches - single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch chain increase decrease
